review:
He has magic in his hands. ** *********** ********* ** **************** *** ***** ** ** ******. I was having issues with my left knee for the longest time.... Was advised kneee replacement surgery by other doctors and hospitals.... He didn't recommend it and treated my knee without me being touched by a knife.
He's extremely patient with his patients. Very polite, Listens keenly n then treats the issue. He makes sure there is a female assistant when his patient is a lady. 
It takes me close to 2hours 1way to visit his hospital since I stay at Horamavu.... But the journey was worth it.
God continue to bless and guide his work. 
Thank you Dr Raghu.

** ***** ** ** ********* ******* **** * ****** ****** * **** **** ************ He has service bend of mind! He is highly experienced and skilled. You will feel safe in his hands! He is very knowledgeable and knows what his field really well. Blessed to have him!
The doctor  was crisp and to the point and explained the root of the issue. Thank you very much !!
Dr.Raghu ** **** ************* *** explained the problem with my sports injury very well. Also did not ask for further unwanted X-rays or check ups.
Knowledge and very Humble. Explains in detail and helps us take appropriate decisions. Honest in opinion.
Doctor is very patient while listening to the problem. He knows exactly how to diagnose the issue. I would definitely recommend the doctor for all ortho related issues. Extremely happy.

I am very much delighted with the patient approach of the doctor in explaining the problem. He explained the course of treatment in great detail. Highly satisfied with the doctor and I would highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor is able to spend time explaining the health issue and indicates the causes for it…very congenial and comfortable feeling meeting doctor…
